headline: Should AT&T’s New AWS and Amazon LEO Connectivity Alliance Require Action From AT&T (T) Investors?
summary: Earlier this month, AT&T, Amazon Web Services and Amazon Leo announced a collaboration to pair AT&T’s fiber network with AWS cloud and AI tools, while using Amazon Leo’s low Earth orbit satellites to extend fixed broadband connectivity for business customers across the U.S. The partnership effectively ties AT&T’s physical network footprint into AWS’s cloud and Amazon Leo’s satellite capabilities, potentially reshaping how enterprises access resilient, hybrid connectivity and compute...
